Package com.linkedpipes.lpa.backend.services

Class ExecutorServiceComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedpipes.lpa.backend.services.ExecutorServiceComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutorService
    @Service
@Profile("!disableDB")
public class ExecutorServiceComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutorService
    Wrapper to start discovery or execution while linking it on user profile in the database.

      • startDiscoveryFromInput

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Discovery startDiscoveryFromInput​(@NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.lang.String discoveryConfig,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.lang.String userId)
                                           throws LpAppsException,
                                                  UserNotFoundException
        Legacy start discovery from input endpoint. Uses startDiscoveryFromInput but sparqlEndpointIri, dataSampleIri and namedGraphs are set to null.
        Specified by:
        startDiscoveryFromInput in interface ExecutorService
        Parameters:
        discoveryConfig - configuration passed to discovery service
        userId - web ID of the user who started the discovery
        Returns:
        discovery ID wrapped in JSON object
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - call to discovery failed
        UserNotFoundException - user was not found

      • startDiscoveryFromInput

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Discovery startDiscoveryFromInput​(@NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.lang.String discoveryConfig,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.lang.String userId,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  @Nullable java.lang.String sparqlEndpointIri,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  @Nullable java.lang.String dataSampleIri,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  @Nullable java.util.List<java.lang.String> namedGraphs)
                                           throws LpAppsException,
                                                  UserNotFoundException
        Start a discovery using the provided configuration, log the started discovery in the DB on the user profile, notify discovery started via sockets and start status polling.
        Specified by:
        startDiscoveryFromInput in interface ExecutorService
        Parameters:
        discoveryConfig - configuration passed to discovery service
        userId - web ID of the user who started the discovery
        sparqlEndpointIri - SPARQL endpoint IRI provided in frontend to be recorded in the DB
        dataSampleIri - data sample IRI provided in frontend to be recorded in the DB
        namedGraphs - list of provided named graphs to be recorded in the DB
        Returns:
        discovery ID wrapped in JSON object
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - call to discovery failed
        UserNotFoundException - user was not found

        Specified by:

      • executePipeline

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Execution executePipeline​(@NotNull
                                          @NotNull java.lang.String etlPipelineIri,
                                          @NotNull
                                          @NotNull java.lang.String userId,
                                          @NotNull
                                          @NotNull java.lang.String selectedVisualiser)
                                   throws LpAppsException,
                                          UserNotFoundException
        Call ETL to execute a pipeline, record execution in the DB, notify execution started on sockets and start polling for execution status.
        Specified by:
        executePipeline in interface ExecutorService
        Parameters:
        etlPipelineIri - IRI of the ETL pipeline to execute
        userId - WebID of the user (used to select where to map execution in DB, where to notify on sockets)
        selectedVisualiser - frontend string stored in DB
        Returns:
        execution iri in JSON object for frontend to use
        Throws:
        LpAppsException - request to ETL failed
        UserNotFoundException - user not found
